dcterms:description: Market-1501 was collected on the campus of Tsinghua University, shot in the summer, and released publicly in 2015. It includes 32,668 person images of 1,501 identities captured by 6 cameras. Each identity is captured by at least 2 cameras, and there may be multiple images in one camera. The training set has 751 people, containing 12,936 images; the test set has 750 people, containing 19,732 images.
dcterms:title: Market-1501

dcterms:creator: E. Ristani
F. Solera
R. Zou
R. Cucchiara
C. Tomasi
dcterms:description: DukeMTMC-reID was collected at Duke University in the winter of 2017. It is a large-scale multi-target multi-camera pedestrian tracking dataset, providing a new large HD video dataset recorded by 8 simultaneous cameras, with more than 7,000 single camera tracks and more than 2,700 independent characters. DukeMTMC-reID contains 16,522 person images of 702 identities, providing manually marked bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: DukeMTMC-reID
